mapper.select: select pr.productNum, requestDate ,pr.name productName,r.requestNum, c.num,c.name, r.total, r.addr1 deliverAddr1, r.addr2 deliverAddr2, r.zip deliverZip, r.tel deliverTel, r.name deliverName, r.memo, r.status, p.payMethod, p.point usePoint, p.purchase,p.stackPoint point, rd.requestDetailNum, rd.productCount, rd.productNum, rd.productSum, pr.imageFileName FROM request r JOIN customerdetail c ON r.num = c.num JOIN requestDetail rd ON r.requestNum = rd.requestNum JOIN product pr ON pr.productNum = rd.productNum JOIN payment p ON r.requestNum = p.requestNum WHERE r.requestNum = #{requestNum}

select pr.productNum, requestDate, pr.name productName, r.requestNum, c.num,c.name, rd.productSum, r.status, rd.productCount, pr.imageFileName from request r JOIN customerdetail c ON r.num = c.num JOIN requestDetail rd ON r.requestNum = rd.requestNum JOIN product pr ON pr.productNum = rd.productNum where c.num=#{num} order by requestDate desc OFFSET #{offset} ROWS FETCH FIRST #{rows} ROWS ONLY
select r.requestNum, requestDate, requestDetailNum from request r join customer c on c.num=r.num join requestDetail rd on r.requestNum = rd.requestNum where c.num=#{num}
SELECT md.num, cd.name, md.userId, md.mileage, cd.email, cd.tel, md.addr1, md.addr2, md.zip FROM customerDetail cd JOIN memberDetail md ON cd.num = md.num WHERE md.num = #{num}
select nvl(count(*), 0) from request r join customer c on c.num=r.num join requestDetail rd on r.requestNum=rd.requestNum where c.num=#{num}
